com.betterit.kaligia.features

Class Repeat

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.betterit.kaligia.features.Repeat

  • public class Repeat
extends java.lang.Object
    A Repeat one single segment A repeat will have multiple Wavenumber objects that represent its Spectra

    • Method Detail

      • isSaturated

        public boolean isSaturated()
        Checks if Spectra is saturated
        Returns:
        true if any point of the spectra is saturated (i.e. above 65,535), false otherwise

      • range

        public void range(java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.Integer>> ranges)
        Modify Repeat's Spectrum such that only Wavenumber objects whose wavenumber property fall out side all of the given ranges are excluded
        Parameters:
        ranges - A single dimensional array of String, where each item is a String representation of an integer.
        The multiple ranges are formed from this single dimensional array like shown below: (letters represent integers as String)
        [A, B, C, D] ==> [ [A, B] , [C, D] ], here A-B and C-D would be the array of ranges
